title: 03/31/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/31/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys set the stage for the Final Four after UCLA and Gonzaga punched their tickets. ESPN’s NFL Draft Analyst Matt Miller joined the show to explain how pro days are just a fun thing to talk about and why Mac Jones is not the right pick at no. 3 for the Niners. On the NFL side of things, Deshaun Watson’s lawsuits continue to pile up, Mike Florio thinks that the best plan for Watson is to find ways to come to a settlement to avoid any harsher punishment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys set the stage for the Final Four after UCLA and Gonzaga punched their tickets. ESPN’s NFL Draft Analyst Matt Miller joined the show to explain how pro days are just a fun thing to talk about and why Mac Jones is not the right pick at no. 3 for the Niners. On the NFL side of things, Deshaun Watson’s lawsuits continue to pile up, Mike Florio thinks that the best plan for Watson is to find ways to come to a settlement to avoid any harsher punishment.
